Content.Text:
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, are you there? I'm coming in.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, princess. The wait's over... I'm
here to pick you up.
<PAGE>
You want to see the beautiful starry
sky, right? Let's get out of here.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...And we're here. You cold, babe?
<PAGE>
You're shivering a bit, huh? Come
in a little closer and I'll be your
windbreaker.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Take a look, princess. Beautiful,
isn't it, the sky tonight.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's great how just the two of
us can view this pretty night sky
free from interruptions.
<PAGE>
Other festivals where everyone has fun
together aren't bad, but the Starry
Night Fest is one to enjoy in pairs.
I get nervous when it's just us.
It's hard to keep up a conversation.
More to the point... I'm hungry!
I wish we could stay forever.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Huh? Nervous, you say? How cute!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Save that look you've got going just
for me. Don't show it to anyone else.
<PAGE>
Bet you couldn't tell, but I'm actually
kind of the jealous type! Especially
when it's you. You drive me crazy.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
...I don't really mind. Even if you
aren't much for conversation, I feel
comfortable by your side.
<PAGE>
Actually, just looking at the way
you act is interesting enough...
<PAGE>
Ha ha, I kid, excuse the joke. You get
so serious... but I like that about
you.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, boy... Not exactly a lively
conversation here, huh?
<PAGE>
Well, I guess that's just how
you are then. Anyway, shall
we grab some food later on?
<PAGE>
After all, it is the Starry Night
Fest. We might as well head to
the next town for a bite.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ha ha. I feel the same way.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Yeah... It would nice if we could
always be together. That's what I think
every time we have to part ways.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>What I'm feeling now... I guess
I didn't realize how much I've
taken a liking to you, babe.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Princess, you're all mine now... I love
you.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, you're really blushing there, 
huh?
<PAGE>
Well, it looks like you've really fallen
for me, <MYNAME>. So, I guess I've
got nothing to worry about.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Looks like you've got quite a chill. 
Shall we head home soon?
<PAGE>
I wouldn't want my precious princess to
catch a cold, now would I?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Care to take my hand, babe? I wouldn't
want you to take a fall as I escort you
home.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Today was a lot of fun, huh? The night
sky wasn't bad, but it wasn't nearly
as beautiful as you.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good night, <MYNAME>. Let's get to bed
early tonight.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hi, <MYNAME>, it's Rod. I'm coming in, all
right?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, I'm here as promised. I'm
really looking forward to tonight! Well
then, let's get going.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We're here! <MYNAME>, are you cold? Don't
be afraid to come in a bit closer if you
are.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, <MYNAME>! Look! What a splendid starry
sky!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's beautiful, huh... this night sky.
<PAGE>
Lately I've been pretty tired from work,
but taking in this scenery really puts
me at ease.
I'll always be here for you.
I've been tired lately, too.
Don't push yourself too hard.
I'm glad I invited you!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thanks, <MYNAME>!  I actually already
feel at ease just being by your side.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I feel like, even if I come upon hard
times, I can get through it as long as
you're around.
<PAGE>
I hope you feel the same way same way
about me...

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, is that right?! I hadn't noticed
one bit... Sorry, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Well then, what do you say we forget
about work for the night and really
enjoy the starry sky!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Yeah... you're right. Thanks for
worrying about me.
<PAGE>
If you're ever tired, I'll do my best to
help you relax. Know that you can always
count on me.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Me, too. I'm feeling pretty good thanks
to you.
<PAGE>
Well, up above me I have a beautiful
starry sky, and next to me I have a
cute girl. No wonder I feel good.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>The only thing that would make
this even better is... if you gave me a
kiss!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
So... can I kiss you, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Hehe... Looks like you're a little
bashful after that kiss...

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I really want to spend even more time
with you, but walking anywhere this late
is a bit dangerous.
<PAGE>
We should probably head back into town.
Let's grab a hot drink on the way back,
okay?

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you for inviting me today. Let's
go together again next year, too. It's a
promise, all right.

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
See you, <MYNAME>. Stay warm and sleep
tight. Good night.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hi, <MYNAME>. Soseki here. I'm coming in
now.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Your knight in shining armor has come to
rescue his cute damsel... or something
like that.
<PAGE>
All righty then, let's go. The stars
await.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, looks like we're here. The walk just
flew by as we were chatting, huh?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Look, <MYNAME>. It's the starry sky we
were waiting for. Take it all in.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ha ha, <MYNAME>. You sure do look happy.
That's quite the smile you've got there.
<PAGE>
That happy to watch the stars with me,
are we?
You sure are in a good mood, today.
Don't pull my leg!
I'm not really sure.
I'm very happy.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yeah, of course I am. I didn't really 
know what a proper date was like before
this.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Even if it doesn't look like it, I'm
actually a romantic at heart. Everyone
wants a little romance.
<PAGE>
Um... Would you mind not telling that to
anyone. It's our secret, OK?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, apologies! There's no need to get
angry.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>You didn't want to hear that being
with me is part of the reason you looked
so happy.
<PAGE>
I said that like I was testing you or
something. Sorry about that.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ouch! That hurts, you know? Especially
the way you said it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>So that's how it is... I'm
the only one that's happy that we're
together...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Well, you're laughing now,
huh? I guess that's enough for me.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I forgot just how upfront you are,
<MYNAME>. I admit I'm a bit bashful
after that straightforward reply!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Thanks, <MYNAME>. I'm pretty happy, too...
thanks to you, that is.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, <MYNAME>. How about we try closing
our eyes for a bit, and...

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yeah? You think I'm a good kisser?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Well, we are adults here.
Even if I get a bit nervous, I'm not
going to show it, you know.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now then, we better start to head home.
You're cold, right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I'm always a bit warm. If we hold hands
on the way back, we can share my body
heat.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow. That night sky sure is something. I
already want to go again next year.
You'll accompany me, right?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well then, <MYNAME>. Good night! Best
to head to bed early and get a good
night's sleep.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, are you there? Please excuse
me.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you for waiting for me. Shall we
be off to gaze at the stars?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The mountaintop sure is chilly. <MYNAME>,
if you're cold, please allow me to block
the wind for you.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, please take a look, <MYNAME>. That
starry sky is absolutely exquisite.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, you're all smiles, aren't you?
You look quite pleased.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>By chance, do you find it enjoyable to
watch the stars with me?
You look quite happy yourself.
Are you pulling my leg?!
I'm not really sure...
Yes, I'm happy.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Why yes. I'm quite happy indeed. I
enjoy the pretty scenery... And sharing
fond memories with each other.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>After all, they say that joy is doubled
and sorrow is halved when you're with
someone special.
<PAGE>
In other words, I'm saying that I would
like to experience everyday ups and
downs with you by my side.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Excuse me. I'm just so happy to be
together that I got a bit overly
excited.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I'm not teasing you. Please, understand.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ah... I see. I'm sorry, please forget
that I ever asked.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I'm happy you say that.
<PAGE>
I would feel a little lonely if I was
the only happy to be spending time
together.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>On a special night like this,
I'm glad we can share our warm feelings,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>... Could we perhaps share
a kiss?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
...Excuse me. I could not help myself.
You were just so cute.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It has gotten rather late. Shall we head
back to town soon?
<PAGE>
Ah, <MYNAME>, please take my hand. Snowy
paths are quite dangerous by night,
after all.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hope that next year we can view the
night sky together again.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I now bid you good night. Sweet dreams.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, you there? I'm coming in.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Hey, I'm here to pick you up... Let's
go.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here's the summit. You've been shivering
for while now. You all right? You can
take my coat if you're cold...

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Look, <MYNAME>. It's that starry sky
you wanted to see.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Lately work's really been piling up...
but looking at this beautiful scenery
is helping me breathe easy.
I'll always help you relax.
I've been tired lately, too.
I'm glad I invited you.
Don't push yourself too hard.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
What are you saying?! That's nice to
say... but I'm a lost cause.
<PAGE>
Well, I guess I am relying on you. When
I really need it, your support would
actually be nice.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I think you're trying too hard. I know
that hard work is your thing, but try
taking it easy, OK?
<PAGE>
Seeing you looking sad brings me down,
too, ya know. But... I still worry about
you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>When things are tough, come and see me.
The least I can do is stand by you.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yeah, me too. Besides, being up here
with you is cheering me up.
<PAGE>
It's good to see you're also having a
nice time looking at the stars.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I know, I know. Thanks for your concern.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>No one worried about me up
till now... I just felt like a nuisance.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Hearing that puts me at ease. You
really are a wonder, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
So... Could you, ah, close your eyes for
me?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Why did I go and do that? That's not
like me…

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Guess we should head home soon. You'll
catch a cold if we stay out here any
longer.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Hey, <MYNAME>. Give me your hand. It's
nice to hold hands and go for a walk 
once in a while.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Today was fun. Thanks.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I bet you're pretty cold. How about you
grab something warm to drink then have
a nice sleep... Good night.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, you there? I'm coming in now.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The time we arranged for has come, so
I'm here to pick you up. I wonder what
starry sky is in store for us. Let's go.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We're here. The wind is stronger than I
expected and it's a pretty chilly. Are
you OK, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>... can you see that?
What a beautiful night sky.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's pretty nice that we can be all
alone and gaze up at such a splendid
night sky.
<PAGE>
I don't mind other festivals that
everyone enjoys together... But tonight
I'm glad it's nice and quiet.
I get nervous when it's just us.
It's hard to keep up a conversation.
More to the point... I'm hungry!
I wish we could stay forever.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Indeed, I also get a bit nervous. It's
not often we go out together like
this...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Surely we'll come here again next year,
and the one after that as well. I think
eventually we'll get used to it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>You know, I hope that someday we'll
actually feel most at ease when we're
together.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That doesn't really bother me. Even
if we don't talk, just being beside you
puts me at ease.
<PAGE>
Those are my true feelings, you know.
Here under this beautiful starry sky, I
wouldn't dare joke around.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Ah... I wish I brought something that
we could eat.
<PAGE>
If I did, we could have spent even
longer together as we enjoyed the food.
I blew it...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I'll think about what to
bring along next year.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yeah, it seems farming really takes it
out of you, too, huh? That's too bad.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>But in that case... let's really do
our best to enjoy our time together.
<PAGE>
That's how precious and sweet I think
our time together is, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I'm really into you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>, you're blushing. I bet my face
is pretty red, too, huh?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I think this cold is about to get the
best of us. Shall we head back? No need
to hurry, though.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thanks for inviting me today. I had a
wonderful time.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well, see you tomorrow. Good night, 
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, you there? I'm coming in, okay?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
So, I'm here just like I said I'd be.
Want to see the stars?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah... It's cold, huh? My hands are
shaking. Let's stick a bit closer
together, OK?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Up there, look up!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Such a pretty starry sky, and to think
we have it all to ourselves.
<PAGE>
I like other festivals that everyone
enjoys together... But tonight's perfect
just the way it is.
I get nervous when it's just us.
It's hard to keep up a conversation.
More to the point... I'm hungry!
I wish we could stay forever.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hey! If you keep talking like that, I'll
get nervous, too.
<PAGE>
On the other hand, my heart fluttered a
bit as you said that. Was that a special
surprise attack?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>You really got my heart beating,
<MYNAME>. Doesn't look like it's stopping
anytime soon either.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Well, that's just fine then. It's not
bad to have a little quiet once in a
while, is it?
<PAGE>
We are in a romantic situation after
all... Right?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<MYNAME>! Try to give some thought to
the mood here, okay?!
<PAGE>
We should be whispering sweet nothings
in each other's ears!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Well, I guess you could say this kind
of back and forth exchange is pretty
typical for us...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Next year, we should eat first before
coming out here. That way, we can spend
more time together once we arrive.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Don't say so it so frankly... That makes
me embarrassed.
<PAGE>
Still... I'm happy. I do feel the same
way too, you know.
<PAGE>
Thanks, <MYNAME>. I love you.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Tee-hee. Close your eyes, will you.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hehe. Guess we kissed there, huh? Kind
of embarrassing, no?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, I don't want to leave yet, but we
should probably head back soon. Don't
want you catching a cold, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thanks for the wonderful time today.
Let's come together again next year.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
See you tomorrow then. Good night.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. I'm coming in now.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks for waiting, <MYNAME>. Shall we
get going?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, you see that? We've reached
the summit.
<PAGE>
Thanks for taking my hand. These snowy
paths are pretty scary, so I'm glad to
have someone to hold on to.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Look! Over there!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This beautiful starry sky sure is
soothing. Lately I've been spending all
my time practicing new magic tricks.
<PAGE>
Anyway, thanks, <MYNAME>. This has been
a really nice change of pace for me.
I'll always be there to help you.
Yeah, I've been tired lately, too.
Don't push yourself too hard.
I'm glad I invited you!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You'd really do that for me? I'm so
happy!<RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
Actually, I wish I could be comforted by
you, everyday.
<PAGE>
You're the first person who's made my
heart race like this. I just feel so
secure when I'm with you.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>! You should be coming to see me
when you're feeling worn out.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>If you stop by, I'll help
you relax, all right? So... try to be a
bit sweeter to me, tee-hee.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, you really are so kind. It's
sweet that you worry about me like that.
<PAGE>
Do you promise you'll always support me
like that? ...As my sweetheart, of
course.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Me too... I'm so happy to be on such a
romantic date.
<PAGE>
I hope we can go together again next
year. I'm already looking forward to
it.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>... I love you.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Tee-hee. A little embarrassing, huh?
<MYNAME>, your face is turning red.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm... you think we should head back in
to town soon? We'll catch colds if we
stay out here any longer.
<PAGE>
Is it all right if I take your arm on
the way back? I want to get in a little
closer.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thanks again for inviting me... Tonight
will always be a special memory.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well then, catch you tomorrow. Good
night.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello... <MYNAME>, are you there?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, I'm here... Let's go look at
the stars.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Took a while, traveling at night like
this and all.
<PAGE>
Back there... Thank you for supporting
me when it I was about fall.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Look... The stars...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Pretty... The stars are so pretty. This
view is so moving...
<PAGE>
Are you happy too, <MYNAME>? Seeing the
stars... with me. Does that make you
happy?
You also look happy, Yuri.
How do I look to you?
I'm not really sure...
I'm thrilled.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Yes... Tonight is the kind of night that
will surely become a lifelong memory.
<PAGE>
It will a be an oh so precious and
cherished memory... with you.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Why are you avoiding my question? I
wanted to hear it straight from you...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I just want to really enjoy gazing at
this beautiful night sky with you...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh... That's how it is. So, I'm the only
one that's happy here?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>You're joking?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>I told you how I felt. And you... That's
mean.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Well... I'm glad it was just a joke. I'm
happy you actually feel the same way 
that I do.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good. I'm also very happy.
<PAGE>
And the reason I'm so happy is because
I'm here... with you. Thank you for
bringing me along.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Thank you...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My mother will get worried if I don't
get back pretty soon... Let's head home.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you for today... I had a lot of
fun. Please invite me again.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well then... Good night.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, are you there? Please excuse
me.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. Let's go and
watch the night sky just like we
promised.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I knew the mountaintop would be cold.
<MYNAME>, do you mind if I come a little
closer?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Please look, <MYNAME>. The entire sky
is filled with stars.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Just the two of us gazing up at such a 
splendid night sky... It's rather
romantic, is it not?
<PAGE>
I don't mind other festivals that bring
everyone together... But something just
feels right about just the two of us.
I get nervous when it's just us.
It's hard to keep up a conversation.
More to the point... I'm hungry!
I wish we could stay forever.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
